channel.title: Paradox- Economy based - PvP & Skilling - Custom Minigames - Great community
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/29uyrsk.png[/img] [youtube]youtu.be/dfyaLHST-PM[/youtube] [CENTER] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img][URL=http://"http://paradoxrsps.com/"] Forums[/URL] [IMG]http://png.findicons.com/files/icons/1581/silk/16/controller.png[/img][URL=http://"http://paradoxrsps.com/portal/webclient/"]Play now! [/URL] [IMG]http://www.recordsforliving.com/Shared/SmallDownloadIcon.gif[/img][URL=http://"paradoxrsps.com/portal/webclient/client.jar"]Client download[/URL][/CENTER]
[FONT=Arial Black][B]Content[/B][/FONT] [FONT=Garamond]We have lots to do at Paradox, from hunting implings, to agility, to slaying intense and challenging bosses. We aren't just your casual server, we strive make sure content is new, unique and challenging! [/FONT] [FONT=Arial Black][B]Goals & Gameplay[/B][/FONT] [FONT=Garamond]Here at Paradox we strive to pamper all player's goals alike. PvM, PvP, and Skiller, we will make sure to have content equality through all three of those game personas, we strive for an equal, fun, and fluid gameplay for all players alike.[/FONT]
[FONT=Arial Black][B]Community Driven[/B][/FONT] [FONT=Garamond]Here at Paradox we take the community very seriously. The server is community driven and built around your needs, this isn't our server, it's yours! We want you to have an enjoyable server and have a good feedback from all players.[/FONT]
[FONT=System][B]Some Features[/B][/FONT] Ring of wealth Revs all around the wilderness Perfected Combat Formulas Perfected Dragon claws Intense PvP Dwarf Cannon Block larger amounts of damage with better bonuses 22 Skills to master and tackle Realistic economy and drops Full Brimhaven dungeon to explore Full Slayer cave to explore Skeletal Wyverns Many drops for all npcs Staff of Light Revised Magic System Unique to an server A whole Island dedicated to skilling A thieving layer with advanced proficiency Beautiful donator zone and benefits Advanced Farming skill Prestiging system ( 10th max, with rewards , prestige zone, and lots more)
[FONT=System][B]PvM/Bosses[/B][/FONT] Tormented demons Bork King black dragon Godwar bosses Corporeal beast Dagannoth's Jad (1wave) Revs all around the wilderness KQ
[FONT=System][B]Minigames[/B][/FONT] Barbarian assault custom Pest control Dueling arena Hero wars (under construction) Barrows
[FONT=System][B]Mutant Tarn Boss Drops Drawven helmet[/B][/FONT] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vBvqcm3.png[/img]
[B][FONT=System]Use diamond (obtained from killing elfs) to teleport at cave horrors for black mask ![/FONT][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YHder95.png[/img] [B][FONT=System] Get Black mask , Drawven helm to make Slayer helmet ![/FONT][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XLBoyVI.png[/img] Teleport to Bosses - Bork & KQ ! [IMG]http://img198.imageshack.us/img198/5602/nyqx.png[/img]
Prestige zone shop ''Advanced combat shop' [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6F2iOot.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gqzKfed.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KGDDeFC.png[/img] [IMG]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/3900/vy8y.png[/img] [IMG]http://prntscr.com/1m4j2zg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/miTi9xz.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img560.imageshack.us/img560/9756/rkyg.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img710.imageshack.us/img710/5577/8kx2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://prntscr.com/1m4j7m[/img] [IMG]http://www.google.com/images/server_uploads/28636_36269.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.google.com/images/server_uploads/28636_36271.png[/img]
[B] [SIZE=1]*I do not own this server, I am just helping advertise.[/SIZE][/B][/CENTER]

item.title: Paradox- Economy based - PvP & Skilling - Custom Minigames - Great community
item.dc:creator: @BraedenD BraedenD
item.description:
@BraedenD wrote:

[quote=“Elrick, post:2, topic:527723”]This is nothing revolutionary about this server, from what this advertisement shows me. Most servers have pretty much everything this one has and some of them have even better systems. You claim that you make an attempt to have all three aspects (PvM, PvP, and Skilling) as equally important, yet when choosing the xp rate (Which is completely lame, as it really doesn’t prove how cool you are if you choose the hardest setting, as in the end the rewards for going hard are still pretty garbage) all you give is a +5% bonus TO COMBAT. So no, I don’t really think you can say this server strives to do that.

In conclusion, your server does not seem to offer anything that it motto claims to be. I would suggest that you take everything exclusive and truly awe inspiring about the server and compile them into a video and edit this thread.[/quote]

Haters gona’ hate.

From what I’ve seen on the Promo video it looks like a above average server. Its not my type but I can tell you put some serious time in it. At least someone did. (whoever coded the source)

Show some respect.

Read full topic

item.title: Paradox- Economy based - PvP & Skilling - Custom Minigames - Great community
item.dc:creator: @Tygaa Tygaa
item.description:
@Tygaa wrote:

Seeing as you were too ignorant to try the server, and see game modes were removed to balance the game, it’s been made blatantly obvious you haven’t a clue as to what you’re talking about. You also commented on our promo which has gotten nothing but good, and I can’t seem to grasp how hunter and some minor pking clips are the highlight of there server. Of course our video is editted unlike other servers, but that doesn’t take away from content as the video was made in a way earlier stage of the game. You didn’t even try it, and you’re exploiting yourself as an ignorant fool on these forums. Nice try though, next time don’t judge a book by its cover.

Read full topic

item.source: Paradox- Economy based - PvP & Skilling - Custom Minigames - Great community

item.title: Paradox- Economy based - PvP & Skilling - Custom Minigames - Great community
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

This is nothing revolutionary about this server, from what this advertisement shows me. Most servers have pretty much everything this one has and some of them have even better systems. You claim that you make an attempt to have all three aspects (PvM, PvP, and Skilling) as equally important, yet when choosing the xp rate (Which is completely lame, as it really doesn’t prove how cool you are if you choose the hardest setting, as in the end the rewards for going hard are still pretty garbage) all you give is a +5% bonus TO COMBAT. So no, I don’t really think you can say this server strives to do that.

In conclusion, your server does not seem to offer anything that it motto claims to be. I would suggest that you take everything exclusive and truly awe inspiring about the server and compile them into a video and edit this thread.

Read full topic
item.source: Paradox- Economy based - PvP & Skilling - Custom Minigames - Great community
